select count(idx) from t_session where create_time > CURRENT_DATE()
select count(idx) from t_session where create_time between date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and now()
select count(board_id) from t_board
select count(board_id) from t_board where board_regdate > CURRENT_DATE()
select count(board_id) from t_board where board_regdate between date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and now()
select count(qna_id) from t_qna
select count(qna_id) from t_qna where qna_regdate > CURRENT_DATE()
select count(qna_id) from t_qna where qna_regdate between date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and now()

select sum(o.order_purchase_amount) from t_sales s inner join t_order o on s.order_id = o.order_id where s.sales_date > CURRENT_DATE()
select sum(o.order_purchase_amount) from t_sales s inner join t_order o on s.order_id = o.order_id where s.sales_date between date_add(now(), interval -1 week) and now()
SELECT DATE(`create_time`) AS `date`, count(`idx`) as count FROM t_session GROUP BY `date` order by create_time desc limit 0,7

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`create_time`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`create_time`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`create_time`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`create_time`)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(`create_time`, '%Y%U') AS `date`, count(`idx`) as count FROM t_session GROUP BY date order by create_time desc limit 0,7
SELECT DATE(`board_regdate`) AS `date`, count(`board_id`) as count FROM t_board GROUP BY `date` order by board_regdate desc limit 0,7

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`board_regdate`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`board_regdate`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`board_regdate`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`board_regdate`)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(`board_regdate`, '%Y%U') AS `date`, count(`board_id`) as count FROM t_board GROUP BY date order by board_regdate desc limit 0,7
SELECT DATE(`qna_regdate`) AS `date`, count(`qna_id`) as count FROM t_qna GROUP BY `date` order by qna_regdate desc limit 0,7

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`qna_regdate`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`qna_regdate`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`qna_regdate`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`qna_regdate`)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(`qna_regdate`, '%Y%U') AS `date`, count(`qna_id`) as count FROM t_qna GROUP BY date order by qna_regdate desc limit 0,7
SELECT DATE(s.sales_date) AS `date`, sum(o.order_purchase_amount) as count FROM t_sales s inner join t_order o on s.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY `date` order by s.sales_date desc limit 0,7

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(s.sales_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(s.sales_date)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(s.sales_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(s.sales_date)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(s.sales_date, '%Y%U') AS `date`, sum(o.order_purchase_amount) as count FROM t_sales s inner join t_order o on s.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY date order by s.sales_date desc limit 0,7
